Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of commercial paper
proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from repayments of other debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
proceeds from issuance of convertible preferred stock
proceedsfor stock issued during period value sharebased compensation netof shares withheldfor taxes
Repayment of Debt: repayments of long term capital lease obligations
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale maturity and collections of investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in employee related liabilities
increase decrease in other current assets and liabilities net
increase decrease in other noncurrent assets and liabilities net
Deferred Income Taxes: deferred income taxesand other noncash tax expense
Depreciation and Amortization: amortization of financing costs and discounts
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: gains losses on extinguishment of debt
restructuring costs and asset impairment charges

__unmapped__: pension and other postretirement benefit contributions
